channel.title: Allen Piscitello on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Sidechains & Blockstream Liquid
item.description: podcast: https://stephanlivera.com/episode/123/ Stephan Livera: Allen, welcome to the show. Allen P: Thanks for having me on. Stephan Livera: So Allen, I know you’re doing a lot of work with Blockstream and Liquid and side chains, so I thought it’d be great to get you on and just break some of that down for the listeners, but can you just start with a little bit of a background on yourself and what you’re doing with Blockstream?
